input.sentences: the family visits some ancient ruins for their family vacation .
the ruins still stand tall despite ages of weathering and erosion .
however | some of the ruins require slight repair due to erosion .
following the trip to the ruins | they took a motorcycle ride through the city market .
however | they ran into some mechanical issues along the way and had to visit a mechanic .
output.sentences: We visited the ruins on vacation.
The weathering building was standing tall.
They took motorcycles to their trip to the ruins.
We visited the man who ran the mechanical shop.
